bibl.title: Alexandrian Studies in memoriam Daoud Abdu Daoud. (BSAA 45.)
bibl.note: 38 articles. The subjects, associated with Alexandria, include Coptic and Islamic studies.
SWELIM Nabil (Volume Editor) and Pamela C. REYNOLDS (Copy Editor), Alexandrian Studies in memoriam Daoud Abdu Daoud. (BSAA 45.)
Alexandria, Société Archéologique d’Alexandrie, 1993, 4°, xxx-427 pp., 1 portrait en front., figg., 2 pll. coul., 103 pll. n./bl.
